code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import orderService from'../../services/orderService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrderHistory=()=>{const[orders,setOrders]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchOrders=async()=>{const data=await orderService.getOrders();setOrders(data);};fetchOrders();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Order History"}),orders.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No orders found."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"min-w-full bg-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-2",children:"Order ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-2",children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-2",children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-2",children:"Total"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:orders.map(order=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"py-2",children:order._id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"py-2",children:new Date(order.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"py-2",children:order.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{className:"py-2",children:["\u20B9",order.total]})]},order._id))})]})]});};export default OrderHistory;
